description:
Former Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer recently joined Ben to share his advice for young entrepreneurs. They also discussed Steve’s new series, ""Just the Facts,"" in which he researches and presents verifiable information on critical public policy issues, such as immigration, healthcare, and the economy.

description:
Ben Shapiro talks with Mike Rowe about the broken system of higher education in America, Rowe’s straight-shooting advice for 18-year-olds trying to navigate their future, and how AI is impacting blue-collar and white-collar jobs.
